Types/Variations: Monitor displays (various sizes, often touch screen), Controller units, Bumping bars (physical/on-screen). Software varies.
Key Features & Quality/Durability Notes: Features: Seamless integration with POS, Real-time order updates, Customizable routing (by station), Timers, Reporting, Durability (grease/water resistant), Ease of use. Quality: Commercial-grade, ruggedized displays for kitchen environment. Reliable networking. Stable software.
Preliminary Estimated Quantity Notes: Monitors and bumping bars at each kitchen station (grill, fry, prep, expedite). Controllers as required. Quantity based on kitchen size/workflow breakdown.
